H0.text: According to Arthurian legend, who was Sir Galahad's father. Lancelot

H1.text: According to Arthurian legend, who was Sir Galahad's father. Gawain

H2.text: According to Arthurian legend, who was Sir Galahad's father. Percival

H3.text: According to Arthurian legend, who was Sir Galahad's father. Evaine

A4.text: He is the illegitimate son of Sir Lancelot du Lac and Lady Elaine of Corbenic

A5.text: With the help of magic, Lady Elaine tricks Lancelot into believing that she is Guinevere, and thus makes him sleep with her by deception. The ensuing pregnancy results in the birth of his son Galahad
